items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to view and receive updates on task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any team member, all other members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status changes trigger a notification to assigned members.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must be reflected with latency under 2 seconds.

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee.
Tasks can be moved between columns representing different statuses.
non_functional: Board UI should load within 2 seconds.
Support drag-and-drop functionality with smooth animations.

notes: The requirement was high-level and vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Further clarification needed on integrations, permissions, and mobile support.
